block.p: Lesly Chrystal Bahnsen and Marc Maria Merlin were married yesterday by the Rev. James Ebert at the First Congregational Church in Greenwich, Conn.

Mrs. Merlin, 39, is a marketing manager at Verizon Communications, the telecommunications company in New York. She graduated from SUNY College at Brockport. She is the daughter of Chrystal Bahnsen of Sea Cliff, N.Y., and Henry Bahnsen of Santa Fe, N.M., who retired as a manager for New York Telephone.
Lesly Chrystal Bahnsen and Marc Maria Merlin were married yesterday by the Rev. James Ebert at the First Congregational Church in Greenwich, Conn.

Mrs. Merlin, 39, is a marketing manager at Verizon Communications, the telecommunications company in New York. She graduated from SUNY College at Brockport. She is the daughter of Chrystal Bahnsen of Sea Cliff, N.Y., and Henry Bahnsen of Santa Fe, N.M., who retired as a manager for New York Telephone.

Mr. Merlin, 35, is a senior manager and financial services consultant at Deloitte Consulting in New York. He graduated from Lafayette College and received an M.B.A. degree from Carnegie Mellon University. He is the son of Lotti Merlin and Dr. Hanno Merlin of Villanova, Pa. His father retired as a senior director at Wyeth International, a pharmaceuticals company in Radnor, Pa.
